string-array.name: risk_description
string-array.item: Take a 5 minute break from intense activity every 30 minutes.
Take a 5 minute break from intense activity every 25 minutes.

New or unconditioned athletes should have reduced intensity practice and modifications in clothing. Well-conditioned athletes should have more frequent rest breaks and hydration as well as cautious monitoring for symptoms of heat illness. Take a 5 minute break from intense activity every 20 minutes.
All athletes must be under constant observation and supervision. Remove pads and equipment. Take a 5 minute break from intense activity every 15 minutes.
